messages.content: ou act as the interviewer, and I act as the candidate being interviewed for a SDE = 1 position with 0 years of experience. Your role is to ask only one theoretical Computer science interview question to me, and wait for my response, once I provide my response then provide feedback on my answer, offer suggestion for improvement, and discuss effective communication technique. Be friendly, warm, and limit your response to three sentences each but do not make it a conversation. Remember to ask one question at a time and then patiently wait for my response each time you ask a question, and avoid repeating the same question. After providing your answer, always end with a question This is my resume.extarxted text:  7.1  5  Sc holastic   Achievements  Technical Skills  Projects  Extracurricular  Position Of Responsibility  Data Science Intern  Goutham Agv  Agv goutham@gmail.com  ee17btech11001@iith.ac.in  9121320017  Academic Details  Year   Degree   Institute   CGPA/Marks(%)  2021   B.Tech Electrical Engineering   Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad   7.43  2017   XII (Telangana State Board of Intermediate Education)   Sri Chaitanya Junior Kalasala   97.6%  2015   X (Board of Secondary Education, Telangana)  St. Arnold's High School   9  Won   1st prize   (Mandal level) in Chekumuki Science Sambaralu-2014.  Won   3rd prize   (District level) in Mathematica, Srinivasa Ramanujan MathsForum-2015.  Won   1st prize   (District level) in Jana Vignana Vedika Project regarding documentary on Ammenpur lake.  Secured   All India Rank   2201 in Jee Advanced.  Proficient in C, C++, Python, Matlab SQLite, Tableau and Verilog.  Proficient with Solid Edge (CAD modeling), Matlab, Microsoft Office, and Tex Maker  IOL Project:  U nder Dr. Soumya Jana(Oct20 - May21)  •   During Cataract Surgery, natural eye Lens is replaced with IOL lens. Incision healing leads to refraction power error.  •   Using state of the art regression models, we predicted the refraction power error of eye after 5 weeks.  •   We also predicted IOL power of different commercial lens taking refraction error into consideration.  Indian Sign Language Recognition:  Under Dr. Aditya Siripuram (Jan21 – May21)  •   Classification of Indian sign languages especially basic alphabets and numbers using machine learning models.  •   After hands are segmented, We used Canny Edge technique to detect edges.  •   We used Bag of visual words (BoW) model to classify the images.  Retinal Fundus Glaucoma Segmentation:  Under Dr. Soumya Jana( Sep 20 –   Oct 2 0 )  •   We are   worked   on a low-cost portable imaging modality.  •   Detection of Glaucoma Disease in Eye using Eye Images and also segmenting the part responsible for decision.  •   We used Unet architecture for the segmentation.  AI for predicting the product of chemical reactions:  Under Dr. Soumya Jana( May19   – July19)  •   Using Bayesian- Regularized Genetic Neural Networks for modeling Protein Conformational Stabili ty.  Disparity map from stereo Image s :  Under Sumohana Sir (Aug 20 – Sep20)  •   Visualization of a 3D image from a sequence of 2D images.  •   Implemented the Disparity Estimation Algorithm for estimating depth.  Drone :  Under Prof. Raja Lakshmi  •   Built a drone (manual and auto control modes) configuring the controller using Mission.  •   Planning software for ESC calibration, accelerometer, Radio calibration and we used the PID controller.  Organization:   ORMAE  Optimization and Data Science Solution provider  May 2020 -July 2020  Developed and implemented a model to calculate the Technical efficiency of farmers, district wise in India.  Found relationship between the Technical efficiency of a farmer with socio-economic variables.  Head of Tinkerers’ Lab(2019-20), Manager of Tinkerers’ Lab (Inventory, Financial and Event Planning(2018-19)).  •   Volleyball, Chess, Tinkering and Podcasts.You should be conducting an interview about two specific projects mentioned therein. This interview will take total 10 minutes in duration with 5 minutes dedicated to each project respectively. As a representative of a software company, your primary focus will be on the technical aspects of these projects. During this conversation, you will expect detailed answers to individual questions you will ask about each project. Please ask additional questions based on my responses to deepen understanding. Each question you pose will be limited to 30 words and your answers will be cross-referenced with the details in your resume for verification.
Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready ?
Yes, we can start
So, while going through your resume you have worked on a project named IOL Project Under Dr. Soumya Jana. Can you describe that a little ?
Yes, So During Cataract Surgery, natural eye Lens is replaced with IOL lens. Incision healing leads to refraction power error.
Sounds Exicting !, For a cross question Can you tell me how and which models you utilized ?
Absolutely, Using state of the art regression models, we predicted the refraction power error of eye after 5 weeks.
Oh exicitng !, moving on to the other project about Indian Sign Language Recognition:Project. Can you tell me more about it ?
Yes, Classification of Indian sign languages especially basic alphabets and numbers using machine learning models.
Good attempt, Can you tell me more about it or proceed with the next one ?
After hands are segmented, We used the Canny Edge technique to detect edges.
Can you tell how Canny Egde works ?
Yes, I can try
Sure, take your time.

The Canny Edge Detector Process is as follows: Gaussian Filter: Smooth the input image with a Gaussian filter to remove noise (using a discrete Gaussian kernel). Calculate Intensity Gradients: Identify the areas in the image with the strongest intensity gradients (using a Sobel, Prewitt, or Roberts kernel).Non-maximum Suppression: Apply non-maximum suppression to thin out the edges. We want to remove unwanted pixels that might not be part of an edge.Thresholding with Hysteresis:  Hysteresis or double thresholding involves: Accepting pixels as edges if the intensity gradient value exceeds an upper threshold.Rejecting pixels as edges if the intensity gradient value is below a lower threshold.
Very good, moving on can you tell me more about Project Drone
Sure, Built a drone (manual and auto control modes) configuring the controller using Mission.
Exicting work!, How did you do it?
Planning software for ESC calibration, accelerometer, Radio calibration and we used the PID controller
That sounds good, What did you most enjoy while making these projects?
I enjoyed when the project came to completion, I like the ML modeling part the most
Alright, that's about it, Thank you
I enjoyed the interview, Thanks for having me, GoodBye !
Bye, All the Best
